summary: Lehenga store application with admin panel access issues being addressed
architectural_notes: Admin panel route needs verification and authentication setup review
known_issues: Admin panel access route unclear or authentication not properly configured

existing_features.title: Verify and document the exact admin panel route URL in the frontend routing configuration
Ensure the admin panel route properly checks for authentication via Internet Identity before allowing access
Verify that admin privilege verification is working correctly and that the user's identity is properly checked against the admin role in the backend

new_feature_requests.summary: Add clear navigation link or button to the admin panel from the main navigation bar for authenticated admin users
